website_summaries.verdict: No need for a footstool with this ingenious pull-down spice organizer.
pros: Durable, epoxy-coated steel rack holds lots of spice bottles
Shelves drop down 8-inches for easy access to bottles
cons: Needs to be screwed to cabinet for secure use
A few owners complained about shoddy construction

customer_reviews.title: Pull Down Spice Rack
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of hard to figure out whether this spice rack will fit my cabinet or not. See attached photos. - I think a lot of people will see that it fits, and I got rid of that turn-table! We love the idea!
customer_reviews.author: J. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Make your life easier!
customer_reviews.text: I love spices and I love these racks! As a person on the shorter side... they make my life so much easier!!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS AMAZING. I'm so happy with this product. I was desperate for a way to organize all my baking things, all of which are painfully small and lead to mass clutter. Be careful when installing that you don't leave it too close to the edge or it won't pull down the whole way like mine. I'll probably still leave mine the way it is because it isn't that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Hawanchak

customer_reviews.title: So happy to find these on line at amazon
customer_reviews.text: So happy to find these on line at amazon.com. I'm planning a kitchen makeover this summer and I put these two seasoning shelves in my present kitchen to see ho they work. It was an easy install and the instructions were easy to follow. I put my seasonings in the shelves and the cabinet looks more organized than it ever has. Now I'm going to get more organization in my kitchen with the rev-a- shelf items that I've been looking for and not to pay the expected $500 for the caninet that would've come from Lowes or Jericho companies. Thank you so much for alleviating my money worries for the things I really want in my new kitchen!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not if you use spice jars
customer_reviews.text: Great if you use old school McCormick spice in cans, or don’t mind it’s a terrible waste of space if you have jars. Common jar sizes don’t fit well. It would be nice if they made a few different racks specifically for different jar sizes. As it is I can only fit approx 8 jars per level. There is so much empty space on the racks, it’s frustrating. Had high hopes, sadly returning.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two, one for my spices over the microwave/stove and one for medications. It’s fairly easy to install by yourself. The one over the microwave/stove doesn’t open completely. Not all of my spices fit but must do. I had more room without device for my spices. For my medicine, it’s perfect. Most for flawlessly. The expectation are the boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Could
customer_reviews.text: I was very aware that this product would not be super high quality when I bought it. However, it did not even meet my lowered expectations. I am very capable when it comes to work with my hands, but this gave me a bit of a challenge. It doesn’t sit like it probably should and is not level or square, so I had to improvise. The idea is great and I have made it work, but a few improvements such as a sturdier metal and design would make it better.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela JT

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, tricky to install
customer_reviews.text: This didn't fit in my cabinet perfectly. Check your measurements. I had to do a bit of work to make it fit correctly but I'm handy so it wasn't too hard. It doesn't take up the whole cabinet (for me) so there are more spices next to it on the same shelf. They sometimes fall underneath which makes it tricky. It did clear up some space in the cabinet and make things easier to reach, though I rarely extend it. Mostly it functions as a tiered shelf for easy access
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR RENTERS
customer_reviews.text: I can't screw into the cabinets, are you crazy?!?!? Who is gonna pay to replace that!?!?! Super disappointed that there is not other way to affix or secure this without destruction of property. Someone call 3M!! Can't be that hard to make stickers dude. Useless product that is now sitting uninstalled on my kitchen counter since delivery, simply too lazy to return. Of course, the more reviews I write the more motivated I am to stop letting people with crap to sell keep my non-crap money!
customer_reviews.author: Siri

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one rack and my adult children and my husband loved it the minute they discovered it in the cabinet. My girls and I are all under six feet tall so this was a welcome way to reach the spices. Also, obviously, the organization is great. Oh, and we immediately ordered a second rack so now I have two and my cabinet is perfectly organized and accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Photoblue

customer_reviews.title: Embarrassingly bad, even worse install.
customer_reviews.text: While the concept makes sense, I’m surprised that Rubbermaid put this product on the shelves (or amazon boxes, I guess). The install is atrocious, those who’ve said it takes “two people” weren’t kidding. And a carpenter maybe... It’s counterintuitive and frustratingly difficult to install in the cabinet, particularly one that is up high, hence the need for the pull-down. It’s also very unstable, I assumed that there would be some form of spring mechanism or stability control that we couldn’t ascertain from the pictures/description. Nope! You legitimately need two hands and a hard-hat to pull this thing down from the upper cabinets. Great idea, shameful execution.
customer_reviews.author: Anders

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and everything is organized.
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loves these. I installed two of them for spices. SOme others have commented on the placement of these but it boils down to "READING THE DIRECTIONS" ! I know, it is a crazy concept. You will have to make an adjustment if you have a ledge at the front of your cabinet. They work great. Lift up and out and you will have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Very serviceable
customer_reviews.text: The larger the spice container, the less it will hold. But whatever you store in it, will stay there. Easy to see what's in the rack. It can be screwed into a shelf. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Measurements
customer_reviews.text: I wonder if the people who manufacture &/or write instructions ever actually use the product. Make sure you leave enough room to pass the door hinges when extended. Also check the height of the shelf above the top level of the holders to see the clearance of the bottles. I was only able to fit the smallest bottles. Be careful not to install the rack so it interferes with the other door, otherwise you'll have to open both doors to extend it (almost did that).
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Zingale

customer_reviews.title: Too many spices and not enough storage, works great
customer_reviews.text: I was initally worried that this would take up too much space in my cabinet. Once I mounted it and filled it with spices, I was very pleasantly suprised. The configuration allowed me to put more spices in the same area and keep everything neat! I really like this. Works great for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Alwyscoka

customer_reviews.title: Great rack for those small things.
customer_reviews.text: I could only use this on the bottom shelves because uppers were too light and would come up if I pulled rack down. That said, I bought a second rack so I have one on each side of the stove. I really don't need to pull them down because I can see and reach everything with them in place, but it's nice to know I can and if I could put them on an upper shelf, it would be even better.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great spice rack!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and I love them! Easy to install and easy to pull down. All my spice jars fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte L

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It worked about as expected. I'm happy with it! It was a little tricky getting it set to the right depth in the cabinet so it would hide fully when put away, not clip the front edge of the cabinet frame when pulling out, and come out a good distance. I ended up screwing it to a piece of shelving so it was raised up, which worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this spice shelf.
customer_reviews.text: Our cabinets has a raised lip which made the installation a little more challenging. We used shims under the mounting brackets and adjusted them forward so the rack cleared the bottom front of the cabinet and it works perfectly. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: From the First State

customer_reviews.title: Very Cost Effective Shelving
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed using my pull down spice rack. It is ideal for what I needed in a spice rack that I could get without spending hundreds of dollars. It is sturdy enough for my spices, easy to pull down, sturdy craftsmanship and great value.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this for The Shorties Who Want Organized Spices and No Ones Help in This World!!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this spice rack. Admittedly it took me a few tries to get the installation right because you have to make sure that you cabinet with close while allowing you to pull the shelves out and down as well, but once I got it, it was totally worth it!!! I'm 5'0 - this help me feel like a made genius who needs NO ONE's help while making delicious grub in my kitchen!! I would buy a second one if I had the cabinet space and more spices.
customer_reviews.author: E. Laws

customer_reviews.title: Does not pull down in small cabinets!
customer_reviews.text: Caution: these will not work with small cabinets! I used mine anyways but they are too big to "pull down" or be screwed to the cabinet like they should be. As for quality they are great, just need to be in a big cabinet, not an over the stove cabinet or one with shelves it needs a lot of space up and down as well as side to side.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Pohl

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use even from a wheelchair!
customer_reviews.text: This pull-down spice rack is easy to use and the shelves are a generous depth. Although I am in a wheelchair, I find the shelves easy to pull down and put back up using a grabber or a shepherd’s hook. This pull down shelving system is an answer to prayer!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Spice rack. Spice rack some down. Spice rack go up. Let's me put my spices on the high shelf and no more tippy toes. Mainly got it so I can stop hunting for things and knocking everything over. 'Wheres the turmeric?! Omg I just had it yesterday!!!!' Now it sits on the shelf and I can see it behind the seasoning salt.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Haverkos Lehman

customer_reviews.title: The Wife Loves These!!!
customer_reviews.text: She's kind of short and has trouble seeing the spices above the stove. I installed two of these and voila! Now, she can see what spices she has and get at them easily. Greatest things since sliced bread!
customer_reviews.author: A.L. Wilber, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Worked out well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, both still in service, Cleared some clutter, added visibility. Fit was good in cabinets with room on the side for overflow items.
customer_reviews.author: chipster

customer_reviews.title: great for hard to reach shelves
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 of these for my mom, who is vertically challenged. They hold a lot and drop down so you can reach even the top rack without trouble. Mounts with 2 screws on each side.
customer_reviews.author: Dakotahawks

customer_reviews.title: Genius
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely amazing! Great for keeping your cupboards organized and great for those that are vertically challenged.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Works surprisingly well
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really follow the instructions. I just clamped down the brackets until I got where it works. I was surprised how well it actually works. Seems well built and should last in a home setting. I turned the brackets inward so the didn't interfere with the shelf. There is space to put more jars behind and to the side.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T.

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for out new house and sadly it didn't fit but thats ok, I put it in the bathroom and it works great for makeup and the drugs we have in the house
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Great spice Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Great spice shelf. We installed it directly. Easy and fits as described in our shelf.
customer_reviews.author: CaJa16

customer_reviews.title: Easy to find
customer_reviews.text: Had two of these in our old home. Left them for the new owners, knowing they would be so useful. New home...new spice racks. Spices are visible and easy to grab.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Finally a spice rack that works!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you snip away all plastic ties or you’ll struggle with assembly. This is a great product that allows me to FINALLY organize my spices!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It does just what I wanted it to. Holds all the spices that I use!
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Good idea
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Ended up returning because I didn't measure my cabinet and it didn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie O.

customer_reviews.title: Pull down racks great for the height challenged
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it! She is height challenged🙂 and has always needed my help with the spices in the upper cabinets, doesn't need my help anymore! Wish it was a little sturdier but so.far so good
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: I fit so many bottles in this and it's great. Pull it out push it back in
customer_reviews.text: Measure your cabinets. Mine aren't very deep so the top back rack sits in my cabinet but I kicked the first one I bought another. I fit so many bottles in this and it's great. Pull it out push it back in. Installs very easily. Perfect for shorter people or keeping all your spices at your fingers without having to pick them up later.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Casey

customer_reviews.title: They are durable and quite pretty. Very functional and well made
customer_reviews.text: Two fit perfectly in my cabinet. They are durable and quite pretty. Very functional and well made. I bought 4 and I'm glad I did. Spices are stored in 2 and vitamins in the other two. Very convenient since my cabinets are very tall. The spill trays are a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 and they barely fit into our cabinets. 4 stars because of the material they're made out of. When pulling the rack down you can't touch the white trays or they will snap out of place. Wire baskets is flemsy and rickety.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Used 2 of these in a cabinet. Folds down nice. Feels sturdy. Holds alot of different sizes spice containers.
customer_reviews.author: Mark LaChappell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I have the 1950 style metal cabinets and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: dolores

customer_reviews.title: STORES QUITE A FEW SPICES
customer_reviews.text: This is a tough call. Am I crazy about?-not really. Does it do the job? Yes. I do find it knocks on the top shelf when pulling it in and out and one side of the shelf is out of whack with the other.
customer_reviews.author: L Sager

customer_reviews.title: Excellent spice set-up
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Great space saver and holds a ton of spices!
customer_reviews.author: Kishibear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: Great way to store all your spices and have them at your fingertips!
customer_reviews.author: momcher

customer_reviews.title: disapointed
customer_reviews.text: It looked like a great idea, but when I got around to installing it found the weld had not been done on one of the supports. Trying to decide now whether to try to fix it myself or return it and have no spice rack for another few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Meg L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mount
customer_reviews.text: the rack is easy to mount but set in place with the barkets in place and mark holes that need to be drilled to check on clearance. My wife loves it as she can finally reach all three rows. Well engineered.
customer_reviews.author: gramps

customer_reviews.title: Buy the less expensive colors - white, black, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and functions well. However, it is not stainless steel, it's like a powder coat paint. Buy the less expensive one, don't wait your money on "stainless steel"
customer_reviews.author: office lady

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly. I was able to fit 21 spice jars (varied sizes and shapes) in it. It’s convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product I now have two. Use in the top shelf of my cupboard so it makes everything reachable
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ethridge

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to its description
customer_reviews.text: Fits in a cupboard that is otherwise awkward to reach because it is narrow and set back between a wall and refrigerator . Now I pull the shelves down while cooking and spices are within easy reach. Shelves lift back easily into place. Liner trays keep jars from tipping over. Love the product.
customer_reviews.author: candyshores

customer_reviews.title: Best spice rack ever.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutly love this product. Easy to install and it works fantastically
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us short people!
customer_reviews.text: Allows me access to the higher shelves for my spices without grabbing a step stool. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris N.

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Must be careful when pulling out , returning but I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jim P.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the spice rack. All my spices fit in it. It made use of a difficult cabinet. I’m a short person. This rack let’s me see & reach everything. Glad I got it!
customer_reviews.author: EMH

customer_reviews.title: Just love the organized look of my spice bottles lined up ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got the two spice racks installed and filled with my spices. Just love the organized look of my spice bottles lined up were I can see them all. This is a fabulous product!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Love this storage item
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot of spices and works good. It is a little flimsy but not bad and easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Amy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I cannot recommend this product enough
customer_reviews.text: I have a small kitchen, and organization is key for maximizing space. I cannot recommend this product enough. It is sturdy, really holds a lot of spices, and is so useful.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Spice-organization-heaven!
customer_reviews.text: This solves our problem of organizing our spices! Since this rack pulls down, we can see what we have. Each shelf holds about 6-7 medium sized spice containers.
customer_reviews.author: Shadling

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Works as advertised. Design and construction seem sturdy enough to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tim K.

customer_reviews.title: Expand your imagination
customer_reviews.text: Great for sorting medicines. Makes it easier to reach. Probably will get more to use in craft room.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Ekul

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery,  good quality
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't fit in my cabinet to be a pull down but I mounted it on the wall, works great.
customer_reviews.author: John E Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Love this spice rack
customer_reviews.text: Love this spice rack, in fact I bought two of them. My seasonings and spices are so convenient and orderly I am using them more often. Racks are not hard to install and do what they are advertised to do. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Easy Reach
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to use the tall cabinet and still organize and reach the spices. Wish it was a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: emh

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: It's so cool. I put it in the cupboard right by the stove. Used it today for the first time. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Spice rack
customer_reviews.text: It's works just like advertised. My wife loves it. It was pretty easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this spice rack especially since it came with trays. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Kat74

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy and useful. It takes up more space than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and seems great. Just got it today so idk about durability but it feels very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly in my pantry. Just what I wanted. Was right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Seems a bit rickety at first, but works surprisingly good.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Organized the cupboard in no time. Installation was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: A. J.

customer_reviews.title: Best thing to use to get your spices organized!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the easy installation! I just love the product
customer_reviews.author: Lesli Heyden

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product did not come with brackets to secure to the cabinet. How am I supposed to use it??
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Arnott

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect and it is great that I can put my ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel that the rack should be made out of sturdier material even if the manufacturer has to charge a little more for it. It is working well for me now but I do not think it will hold up for any length of time. The size is perfect and it is great that I can put my spices on a shelf that I would not ordinarily be able to reach.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Schneider

customer_reviews.title: the idea is good, but unfortunately the number of jars that can ...
customer_reviews.text: the idea is good, but unfortunately the number of jars that can be held is a lot less than if the rack was not used in the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please include measuring specs
customer_reviews.text: Because exact dimensions were not readily obvious, I was unable to use this product
customer_reviews.author: Nila Aamoth

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this over the microwave in 40 minutes right before going to work! The box came with no instructions but I figured it out after a few tries. I had to add a couple of rubber bumpers/bolts under the front screws to give it an angle to clear over the microwave
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlie

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose well
customer_reviews.text: I like my spices neatly organized, visible and accessible which can be done easily, but I'm on the shorter side, which can make this a bit challenging. These pull down racks solve all my problems. It probably took 5 minutes to install each of them and I did it myself. Once loaded, it's best to pull down the rack using both hands and not very quickly, but it's very easy to move and feels sturdy in place. Great quality and price. Seems like a great product for anywhere that has items that end up stacked. The shelves are deeper than standard spice bottles so it can accommodate a variety of sizes
customer_reviews.author: steller

customer_reviews.title: Nah. Great idea but execution leaves much to be desired.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this so badly that I bought TWO. Installation is tricky because they've got to be positioned EXACTLY RIGHT or they won't pull down and clear the bottom lip of the shelving unit. Also, it's hard to reach into a cabinet to install small screws with a large drill. I'll be moving to a storage system that's more easily customized to the space. Probably something with shelves that hug the walls.
customer_reviews.author: Idgie Threadgoode

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I am short and I have a small kitchen. When you have a small kitchen and you are short, you have to get creative. I love a big choice of spices and this organizer has been just what I needed. I will say it was a pain in the backside to install, just frustrating, not difficult. I screwed the anchors in, no problem. Getting the little wires into the anchors was something different. I got so frustrated, I needed to walk away and get back to it later. :)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better design
customer_reviews.text: I took a pic of the other one I have to better show my issue. I keep knocking the white tray (which really should be attached!!) of the bar when I grab it to pull it down. My other one has less space between the slats, so it’s more stable. I uploaded a video so you can see what I mean
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Not a space saver, but does bring spices closer to eye level
customer_reviews.text: I thought the spice rack would save me horizontal space by using more vertical space; it does not. The three rows of spices will take up as much shelf space as they would by simply lining them up on a shelf. The pull down ability of this spice rack gains you about 8-10" of bringing the spices closer down to your eye level. If that is what you are looking for, then this would be a good purchase. If you are looking to save space, this would not be a good choice. Also kind of a pain to install (requires screws and a drill)
customer_reviews.author: K. Coyne

customer_reviews.title: Super spice organizer
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I managed for so long before finally purchasing this spice organizer. Two of them fit side by side in my 30 " wide cabinet and my life in the kitchen is so much better now. There's even room behind them to store spices I use infrequently. Easy to access everything. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Opinionated

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly the Size they say it is
customer_reviews.text: I tried to install this last night in my cabinet only to find that when you try to pull the shelf down, it moves up before moving down, so you need more clearance on your shelf than the size listed on the packaging. Be aware!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much I’m buying a second
customer_reviews.text: This is the best spice rack I’ve ever had and I’ve had a LOT of kitchens and different types of racks. It’s all there, eye level, no digging around and tipping over. I’m buying a second one for my baking flavoring and colors, and the big containers like salt and baking soda. I wish I’d found this years ago. It’s a winner.
customer_reviews.author: T. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Rack
customer_reviews.text: Love this spice rack. The best thing about it is the height difference of the tiers, so that you have clear visibility to the back rows. I was able to put this in a cabinet opening of 13.5 inches and it will deploy out as intended. I would have given it five stars but the one I received was not quite square, the frame was a bent a bit. Good enough to sit in my cabinet however.
customer_reviews.author: Slade

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install - Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I had to give this to someone because it did not fit in our cupboard. It is well made, easy to install and the people who received it is very happy. I will buy another one when my new cupboards are installed.
customer_reviews.author: desert dweller

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install - Exactly What I Needed!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Fits spice jars, 4 oz Mason jars, and the big Costco spice jars (garlic powder, cinnamon, etc). Exactly what I needed to tame my spice cupboard!
customer_reviews.author: K. Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for upper cabinet shelves!
customer_reviews.text: Turned the unusable small cabinets above the vent hood into an organized usable place for the spices. Can see & reach everything now. The shelves are large enough for larger size bottles/ jars. (The refill salt will fit). Nice surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Free Bird

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to organize my spices. Tired of pulling down bottle after bottle looking for what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works great for medications
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to organize our medications and first aid supplies. Everything is visible, it folds out for easier access, and it's easy to reach behind it to access less frequently used items.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: It has been a highlight in our kitchen cabinet. It is easy to install and operate. Make sure you have enough clearance for pulling down.
customer_reviews.author: handson

customer_reviews.title: Really great product! Was excited to use it
customer_reviews.text: Really great product! Was excited to use it. I failed to measure my cabinets before buying. It did not fit in cabinets. I have a double wide. But overall this is great product, looks very durable and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Raelyn

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the most convenient & cool product I've ever purchased. I have so many spices that took up a ton of room on my counter. This product has helped my kitchen look so much neater, & you can pull it out so nothing is never out of reach!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... that was all white and I think it was better made. The stainless one with the white trays ...
customer_reviews.text: Had one similar to this that was all white and I think it was better made. The stainless one with the white trays is a little more wobbly than the all white one. That said, it does what it is supposed to and my 5' tall wife can now reach the second shelf in our spice cabinet. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Tom Barnard

customer_reviews.title: Love this, thinking I might need a second one.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing, there was just a mess of spices in my cabinet and it was always difficult to find what I needed. My hubby installed this for me and now I can see and reach everything with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Days Homestead

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Miracle shelf that I didn’t know existed Fits everything and is well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Pepto

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for the shorter people in life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help organize my medicine cabinet. I'm pretty short and the extending feature helps so much! The construction is fairly cheap and I've already had one metal-to-metal connection point pop apart but it hasn't caused any problems when it comes to the pull-down function or keeping my medicines contained.
customer_reviews.author: Nightfademusic

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $25.
customer_reviews.text: I have to used two hands to pull it out, and it's really shaky putting it back in the cabilnet.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Segal

customer_reviews.title: Great Rack
customer_reviews.text: I love this rack - it’s helped so much to allow me to organize all the spice bottles. They are all in the top shelf and it’s easy to pull them down and access when needed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Flanagan

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid Pull Down Spice Rack, Clear
product_meta.description: Maximize pantry storage space and keep spices organized with the Rubbermaid Pull Down Spice Rack. This spice rack organizer securely mounts on cabinet shelving and simply pulls down to display spice jars, making it easier than ever to access. Designed with wires spaced further apart, Contents can quickly be identified so finding the right spice for your recipe is a breeze. Each row features a white plastic tray to prevent items from falling through. Holds up to 18 spice jars (not included). Hand wash recommended.
feature_bullets: Pull down spice rack features stadium shelving to maximize cabinet space
Pull-down feature allows easy access to your spices
Fits approximately 18 spice jars (spice jars not included)
White plastic trays keep items from falling out
Easily mounts to wood shelving for a secure hold
